filter

java.lang.Object filter(java.lang.Object name, java.lang.Object url, java.lang.Object method, java.lang.Object clozure)
Creates a named filter for this url/method combination.
Parameters:
name - The name of this filter - for logging and debugging
url - URL on which this filter will be applied
method - HttpMethod -> GET, POST, PUT, DELETE
clozure - Filter behavior
Returns:

filter

java.lang.Object filter(java.lang.Object name, java.lang.Object url, java.lang.Object method, java.lang.Object options, java.lang.Object clozure, java.lang.Object order = 5)
Creates a named filter for this url/method combination.
Parameters:
name - The name of this filter - for logging and debugging
url - URL on which this filter will be applied
method - HttpMethod -> GET, POST, PUT, DELETE
options - Filter Options: passRouteParams :boolean -> if true the path variables will be passed to 'clozure'
clozure - Filter behavior
